title: \*Real OK Ichiban\* Please ID this sans-serif headline font, should be easy...
content:
...but I am too ignorant to do it. Is it some kind of condensed Helvetica Neue ? The R on “real” looks different..you see, I could really use some help.

Gracias - Grazie - Bloody cheers - Thanx - Danke - Merci - Arigato gozaimasu ;-)

author: huggyGiraffe

comments.content: Looks like Futura Condensed Extra Bold
thanks, exact match! Futura, of course !!
